thread.title: Special Sign Alerts People To Important Masonic Events - Designed by InventHelp Client (DHM-110)
thread.title_full: Special Sign Alerts People To Important Masonic Events - Designed by InventHelp Client (DHM-110) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Special Sign Alerts People To Important Masonic Events - Designed by InventHelp Client (DHM-110)
text:
InventHelp, based in Pittsburgh, is submitting this idea, the DEVICE FOR ENTRANCE AWARENESS, to companies for their review.
PITTSBURGH, PA
An inventor from Oak Ridge, NC, wanted to offer Masons an easy and effective way to show that an important lodge event is going on and people should be quiet and reverent.
The easy-to-use, portable DEVICE FOR ENTRANCE AWARENESS provides an easy, effective way to alert people to important events going on in a Masonic lodge. It reminds people to lower the noise level for reverence. It also avoids confusion and interruption. The idea is patent pending.
The original design was submitted to the Durham office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-DHM-110, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
